alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 18 at 12:28PM MST until December 19 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. There will be a high risk for blow offs or blowovers for light weight and high profile vehicles such as empty box semi trucks and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range
